mapper.update: UPDATE user_detail_tb AS u INNER JOIN cash_tb AS c ON u.user_id = c.user_id SET u.user_totalcash = u.user_totalcash + c.cash_price WHERE u.user_id = #{userId} AND c.cash_code IN( SELECT CONCAT("cash",MAX(CAST(substring(cash_code,5) AS DECIMAL))) FROM cash_tb );

mapper.select:
SELECT cash_price,cash_date,cash_state FROM cash_tb WHERE user_id=#{userId} AND cash_state='충전' AND cash_state='출금'
AND cash_date >CURDATE() AND cash_date >DATE_SUB(NOW(),INTERVAL 1 WEEK) AND cash_date >DATE_SUB(NOW(),INTERVAL 1 MONTH) AND cash_date >DATE_SUB(NOW(),INTERVAL 3 MONTH) AND cash_date >DATE_SUB(NOW(),INTERVAL 6 MONTH)
ORDER BY cash_date DESC
